A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The townspeople form an angry mob to destroy the beast that is terrorizing their lives.
Based on the famous true story, this one and only hit should not have been made. A second print was slashed with scissors at midnight but the film had been withheld from several cities due to advertising integrity according to early reviews
